entries.$comment: This is the next release, any changes here
entries.title: Version 0.0.0

changes.description: Extra options for history compaction in `q chat` - see `/compact --help` - [#402](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/402)
Issues with `/compact` - [#407](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/407)
Piping input into `q chat` - [#363](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/363)
An issue with `/compact` not being executed on context window overflow - [#365](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/365)
The `-a` flag to alias to `--trust-all-tools` - [#372](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/372)
Terminal bell support for the emacs eat terminal - [#357](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/357)
Autocompletion with ghost text in `q chat`. Accept completions using right arrow or `Ctrl + f` - [#288](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/288)
A purpose tag for the `fs_write` tool that summarizes the change being made - [#279](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/279)
The `/context hooks` slash command to `/hooks` in `q chat` - [#223](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/223)
`--trust-tools` to work with MCP tools in `q chat` - [#206](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/206)
Formatting for error messages on prompt retrieval from MCP servers - [#216](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/216)
File name extension inconsistency with `/save` and `/load` in `q chat` - [#289](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/289)
The default `q chat` model to Sonnet 4 for users in the IAD region - [#219](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/219)
Support for passing arguments to MCP server configuration in the CLI - [#262](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/262)
Support for disabling MCP servers with `disabled: true` - [#257](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/257)
Instructions on using `/prompts` in `q chat` - [#208](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/208)
Validation errors with `/compact` in `q chat` - [#224](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/224)
Issues resolving relative paths with `fs_write` in `q chat` - [#256](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/256)
Support for upgrading to a pro subscription with `/subscribe` in `q chat` - [#143](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/143)
`q chat` failing to launch in some Linux installations - [#169](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/169)
Model selection and Sonnet v4 support with `/model` in `q chat` - [#157](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/157)
Formatting issues with the `fs_read` tool in `q chat` - [#122](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/122)
Various issues in `q chat`
Server load timeout for no interactive mode - [#1851](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1851)
`chat.editMode` to tips - [#1900](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1900)
Unqualified tools from being included in the tools schema - [#84](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli-autocomplete/pull/84)
An issue where an early error from an mcp server will cause loading status to be terminated prematurely - [#1919](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1919)
Tools and prompts not being sorted - [#1809](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1809)
Various issues with `q chat`
An issue where `q chat` would prompt for login while already logged in - [#1862](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1862)
Support for FRA (region `eu-central-1`) for pro users - [#1333](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1333)
Persistent conversations by working directory with `q chat --resume` - [#1767](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1767)
Background MCP server loading in `q chat` - [#1775](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1775)
Image support in `q chat` - [#1489](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1489)
Git-aware file selection in the `q chat` fuzzy finder - [#1649](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1649)
Commands `/save` and `/load` for saving and loading conversation state in `q chat` - [#1762](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1762)
A new subcommand `q mcp` for updating MCP server configuration - [#1836](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1836)
An improved `/context show --expand` in `q chat` - [#1762](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1762)
A new flag `--changelog` to `q version` for displaying the change log from the CLI - [#1375](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1375)
Context files causing overflow in `q chat` - [#1331](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1331)
An issue with token overflow in the `/usage` command in `q chat` - [#1762](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1762)
An issue where non-interactive chat sessions displayed welcome banner - [#1437](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1437)
An issue where the `/context` chat command reference was duplicated in `/help` - [#1438](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1438)
Preferred default of fuzzy find to `ctrl+s` in `q chat` - [#1442](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1442)
Various issues in `q chat`
A bug where chat would sometimes become unresponsive
Model Context Protocol (MCP) support in `q chat` - [#1365](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1365)
Fuzzy finding support for selecting profiles in `q chat` - [#1388](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1388)
`/compact` to display the summary by default in `q chat` - [#1313](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1313)
Various issues in `q chat`
An issue with `/compact` failing in `q chat`
Fuzzy search for slash commands in `q chat` with `Ctrl + k` - [#1181](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1181)
A new capability for dynamically adding context to messages in `q chat` with "context hooks" - [#1218](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1218)
A new command `/usage` in `q chat` to display an estimate of the context window usage - [#1177](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1177)
A new greeting UI with rotating tips in `q chat` - [#1262](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1262)
An extra confirmation prompt before clearing the history in `q chat` with `/clear` - [#1180](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1180)
Support for using a system proxy with the `HTTP_PROXY` environment variable - [#1199](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1199)
The ability to reset a single tool's permissions in `q chat` with `/tools reset` - [#1102](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1102)
Various UI improvements in `q chat`
Arguments for `EDITOR` not being correctly parsed by the `/editor` command in `q chat` - [#1209](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1209)
The `/compact` command failing to compact history after the context window has been filled in `q chat` - [#1275](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1275)
Various issues in `q chat`
A new command `/tools` in `q chat` for granular tool permissioning - [#1054](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1054)
A new command `/compact` in `q chat` for summarizing the conversation history - [#1128](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1128)
A new command `/editor` in `q chat` for composing prompts using the configured editor - [#1035](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1035)
A new command `/issue` in `q chat` for creating new GitHub issues - [#990](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/990)
A new tool `report_issue` in `q chat` for creating new GitHub issues - [#974](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/974)
An improved context file display in `q chat` - [#983](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/983)
Optional terminal notifications on completed responses - [#1135](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1135)
An option `--non-interactive` to invoke `q chat` headlessly - [#878](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/878)
File name autocompletion in `q chat` - [#930](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/930)
Improved `execute_bash` pipe safety checking in `q chat` - [#927](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/927)
Executing `q` now enters `q chat` instead of opening the dashboard - [#987](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/987)
A missing Match criteria error in the ssh integration - [#1134](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/1134)
Various issues in `q chat`
Support for automatically adding files as context in `q chat` - [#834](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/834)
A search ability when reading the filesystem in `q chat` - [#811](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/811)
A larger maximum tool response size in `q chat` - [#850](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/850)
Detecting libc on certain Linux distributions during install - [#851](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/851)
An improved file diff in `q chat` - [#799](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/799)
Multi-line input support in `q chat` - [#831](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/831)
An append functionality with fs_write in `q chat` - [#764](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/764)
Support for WindSurf Next - [#814](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/814)
`ctrl+c` so that it exits `q chat` on first attempt - [#830](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/830)
Minor issues in `q chat`

An enhanced `q chat` with agentic capabilities. See the [announcement post](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/devops/introducing-the-enhanced-command-line-interface-in-amazon-q-developer/) for more information.
Minor issues
Support for Trae [#488](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/488)
Minor issues
Support for Positron [#406](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/406)
Self-updating for Linux AppImage builds [#410](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/410)
Extra lines in inline recommendations [#446](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/446)
Minor issues
Support for Ghostty [#335](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/335)
Support for Guake [#260](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/260)
Accept text through pipes in `q chat` [#259](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/259)
Support for WindSurf [#125](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/pull/125)
Linux SSH installations unable to update [#235](https://github.com/aws/amazon-q-developer-cli/issues/235)
`q translate` providing macOS specific responses on Linux
Support for Linux desktop. See the [AWS documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/amazonq/latest/qdeveloper-ug/command-line.html) for more information.
Minor issues
Minor issues
Minor issues
Minor issues
Linux install script error
Minor issues
Frequent timeout errors in `q chat`
Bash integrations messing up prompt in ZSH child processes
Zsh integration errors when sourced via a non-interactive script
Minor issues
Setting to disable greeting in `q chat`, see [Chat](/chat) for the setting.
Using `tmux` is now supported in ssh.
Logging via the CLI would not show the "Use with Pro license" option.
Support for readline style input in `q chat`.
Pressing enter multiple times triggered `q translate` to immediately execute.
[PKCE-based authorization](https://aws.amazon.com/about-aws/whats-new/2024/05/aws-iam-identity-pkce-authorizations-aws-applications/) for login.
Menubar icon now indicates when there are issues with authentication or the app is not setup.
Added `quit` command to `q chat` ([#211](https://github.com/aws/q-command-line-discussions/discussions/211)).
AI-powered inline completions, see [Inline](/inline) for more info.
Login infinite redirect for first time users.
The "What's New" page with the latest release notes and announcements.
History loading for CLI Completions, press `ctrl+r` to switch to history mode. ([#57](https://github.com/aws/q-command-line-discussions/discussions/57)).
Support for [`generateSpecCacheKey`](https://github.com/withfig/autocomplete-tools/pull/105) for CLI Completions.

entries.title: CodeWhisperer is now Amazon Q
entries.description: Amazon Q Developer is a generative artificial intelligence (AI) powered conversational assistant that can help you understand, build, extend, and operate AWS applications.
